name: Chatz
description: Chatz is a newly opened little café in Horton place. They have a crazy range of things to eat - from lamb chops and grilled prawns to mutton kotthu and buriyani (asian) to nachos and fajitas (Mexican). They also do some salads, soups, burgers and pizza; no shortage for choice really.
tip: Try the bread pudding, you can bring your own booze.
review:
Chatz is a newly opened little café in Horton place. They have a crazy range of things to eat - from lamb chops and grilled prawns to mutton kotthu and buriyani (asian) to nachos and fajitas (Mexican). They also do some salads, soups, burgers and pizza; no shortage for choice really.

සුවපහසු වටපිටාවක, රුපියල් 3000ක් වගේ ගාණකට දෙන්නෙක්ගෙ ම බඩ කට පිරෙන්න කන්න තැනක් හොයනවානම්, ඔයාලට එන්න පුළුවන් තැනක් තමයි මේක. කට්ටිය එක්ක එකතුවෙලා සති අන්තෙක ඕපදූප ටිකක් කතා කරන්න එකතු වෙන්නත් මෙතන හොඳයි.
